body: Tips on how to make morula jam (and by accident morula sweets): "I searched for a recipe for morula jam but never found one. This year I decided to try my luck and I was so pleased with the result. I thought I'd record my results here for other people."

title: Botswana: How To Make Morula Jam

sentence: Tips on how to make morula jam (and by accident morula sweets): "I searched for a recipe for morula jam but never found one.
This year I decided to try my luck and I was so pleased with the result.
I thought I'd record my results here for other people."
